availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Louisa Green Morris. Father of Susan Morris and Mary Jane Morris. Farmer in Hickman County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Graves County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Graves County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Hickman County, p. 16B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, p. 251.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, p. 58B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994035, Graves County Births, p. 200.
